channel.title: CVE Feed for weDevs -- ReCaptcha Integration for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for weDevs -- ReCaptcha Integration for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-37946|2024-08-02T04:04:24.066Z -- wedevs -- recaptcha%20integration%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in weDevs ReCaptcha Integration for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ReCaptcha Integration for WordPress: from n/a through 1.2.5.
